app.name: Octocode MCP
app.one_liner: Empower your AI assistant with the skills of a Senior Staff Engineer by connecting it to real-time semantic code research across public and private repositories and local codebases.

screens.name: Octocode Setup & Skills Marketplace
screens.purpose: Guide users through interactive GitHub OAuth setup, MCP server installation, and skill selection.

rust_commands.name: local_fetch_content
rust_commands.purpose: Read entire files or extract specific sections using pattern matching.

rust_commands.name: local_find_files
rust_commands.purpose: Discover files by metadata such as modification time, size, or permissions.

rust_commands.name: local_ripgrep
rust_commands.purpose: Perform fast regex-based pattern search in local codebase with context lines and pagination.

rust_commands.name: local_view_structure
rust_commands.purpose: Display directory tree with file sizes and filtering options.

mvp_plan: week 1: Add local filesystem commands using ripgrep and native tools
week 1: Build interactive setup wizard with OAuth flow
week 1: Implement core MCP server with GitHub/GitLab integration
acceptance_tests: Agent successfully retrieves code context from GitHub without termination error when using supported models (e.g., Gemini).
Local ripgrep command returns paginated results matching a regex pattern with surrounding context lines.
Setup wizard completes GitHub OAuth and installs MCP server via one-line installer script on macOS, Linux, and Windows.
